# formatWord Function
```{r}
formatWord <- function(word, translation, class){
  if (is.na(translation) ==TRUE)
  return(as.character(word)) else{
    paste("<span class=", "'", class, "'", " ","title=", "'", translation, "'", ">", word, "</span>", sep = "")
  }
  }
```

# Test Case
```{r}
formatWord("Hello", "hi there!", class = "hiword")
```

```{r results='asis'}
cat(formatWord("Hello", "hi there!", "hiword"), "to", "all", "of", "you", 
    "in", formatWord("Television Land.", "TV viewers", "hiword")) 
```
